ygData.subject: RE: Questions about FEAR PLANE....
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I sent bmps of all my gear that the te gentleman that runs this sight did not have so imagine you can go check it out soon at www.gamesdb.net/everquest/.
ygData.messageBody:
At 03:37 AM 8/5/98 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Andy Simpson" <gohorns@...>
>
>
>
>> I am one happy bard tonight :)
>> Got my greaves and breastplate to go with everything else. Now all i need
>> is the arms and gloves and i got the visible set, course the other bard on
>> the server has the gloves and arms only....
>> We also killed more phobo's tonight and they dropped ANOTHER bracer on top
>> of the two from before. But they didnt drop any other bard armour.
>>
>
>So when are you guys going to spill the beans and give us the stats on each
>piece of this bad boy armor! I want to have something to drool over while I
>toil away killing the darkies in Mistmore.
>
>Anthem Dirgemaker
>Level 27 bard of Qeynos
>Solusek Ro
>
I sent bmps of all my gear that the te gentleman that runs this sight did
not have so imagine you can go check it out soon at
www.gamesdb.net/everquest/. Or you can download bmps of me with screenshots
of everything but my bracers (which he already had) and the arms and
guantlets, which i do not have yet, at http://www.jrh.net/eq/imbrued.zip.
Warning, i am a human who wishes he looked half as good as a wood elf :P

Gendal Concorden, lv 49 bard of Tunare
